channel.title: Creating A Server Off Of Online Hosting
channel.description: Hello, I Run A Couple Websites So I Have Online Hosting To Host These Sites...Is There A Way To Host A Moparscape Server Off Of Online Hosting?

item.title: Creating A Server Off Of Online Hosting
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

You cannot host a server on a web hosting account off of GoDaddy. You either need Dedicated hosting, or a VPS.

Read full topic
item.source: Creating A Server Off Of Online Hosting

item.title: Creating A Server Off Of Online Hosting

item.description:
@Straightupimp wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:2, topic:241350”]Its called a ‘VPS’ or a ‘Dedicated server’,

You upload the files, And do the rest,

(Depends on the online server type.)[/quote]

??? i have godaddy hostin i upload files and “do the rest”?
